title: 鼠标光标错误码
summary: Input Kit MultimodalInput 模块的 鼠标光标错误码，提供相关接口和功能说明。

sections.title: 26500001 无效的windowId
sections.summary:
**错误信息**

Invalid windowId. Possible causes: The window id does not belong to the current process.

sections.title: 3800001 多模输入服务内部错误
sections.summary:
**错误信息**

Input service exception. Possible causes: 1. Memory allocation failure. 2. Thread busy. 3
